Uses of Class
pizzaProgram.dataObjects.Order

Packages that use Order
pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils This package contains various utility classes for reading from and writing to the database. 
pizzaProgram.dataObjects This package contains classes that encapsulates various data from the database, like Dishes, Customers etc. 
pizzaProgram.gui This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs. 
pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI. 
pizzaProgram.gui.utils Package containing an utility class used by the DeliveryGUI class. 
pizzaProgram.utils This package contains tools for formatting data and calculating prices.

Methods in pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils with parameters of type Order
static void DatabaseWriter.markOrderAsBeingDelivered(Order order)
          Updates the status of the order entered from "has been cooked" to "being delivered", if and only if the status of the order is still "has been cooked" and the order's delivery method is "deliver at home".
static void DatabaseWriter.markOrderAsDelivered(Order order)
          Updates the status of the order entered from "being delivered" to "delivered", if the delivery method is "deliver at home", or from "has been cooked" to "delivered" when the delivery method is "pickup at restaurant.
static void DatabaseWriter.markOrderAsFinishedCooking(Order order)
          Updates the status of the order entered from "being cooked" to "has been cooked", if and only if the status of the order is still "being cooked".
static void DatabaseWriter.markOrderAsInProgress(Order order)
          Updates the status of the order entered from "registered" to "being cooked", if and only if the status of the order is still "registered".
private static void DatabaseWriter.updateOrderStatusIfStatusMatchesCurrentStatus(Order order, String currentStatus, String newStatus)
          A general function that updates the order status of an order.

Uses of Order in pizzaProgram.utils
 

Methods in pizzaProgram.utils with parameters of type Order
static String ReceiptGenerator.generateReceipt(Order order)
          Generates a receipt String from an order, formatted with HTML
static void ReceiptGenerator.generateReceiptAndWindow(Order order)
          This method takes an order and creates an html-receipt from its data
static String PriceCalculators.getDeliveryCostForOrder(Order o)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" containing the delivery cost of the provided order (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
private static int PriceCalculators.getPriceForOrder(Order o)
          Generates the value of the order, in norwegian øre (1/100 NOK), based on the sum of the ordered dishes and extras in the order.
static String PriceCalculators.getPriceForOrderWithoutVAT(Order o)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, without VAT and delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
static String PriceCalculators.getPriceForOrderWithVAT(Order o)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, with VAT, but without delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
static String PriceCalculators.getPriceForOrderWithVATAndDelivery(Order o)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" based on the sum of the items in the order, with VAT and delivery cost added (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
static String PriceCalculators.getVATForOrder(Order o)
          Generates a priceString on the form "0,00" containing the VAT for the provided order (IE a price in norwegian øre of 12345 would return a string which contains "123,45".
